name: viking-garage-api
description: A worldwide marketplace and community for real people riding real motorcycles. Local private rentals, repairs, tours. VG brings the Platform and logistics.

DATABASE_SSL.description: Check if databse support SSL connection (set true for remote db)

DEBUG.description: Env var for logs (set to 'api:*' to show API services logs)

GMAIL_CONTACT_CLIENT_ID.description: Client id for gmail contact alias

GMAIL_CONTACT_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client secret for gmail contact alias

GMAIL_CONTACT_REFRESH_TOKEN.description: Refresh token for gmail contact alias

GMAIL_CONTACT_USER.description: Email address of gmail contact alias

GMAIL_RIDE_CLIENT_ID.description: Client id for gmail ride alias

GMAIL_RIDE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client secret for gmail ride alias

GMAIL_RIDE_REFRESH_TOKEN.description: Refresh token for gmail ride alias

GMAIL_RIDE_USER.description: Email address of gmail ride alias

JWT_SECRET.description: Random string for JSON Web Token generator

JWT_SESSION.description: Check if JSON Web Token keep session

NODE_MODULES_CACHE.description: Heroku maintains a cache directory that is persisted between builds

VG_LIMIT.description: Limit for pagination in main view
